__e: So, when he was after you the first time, where'd you see him next, after Jitters?
Have you ever seen him with another girl at school?
Did you see the gathering on your property?
You know them pictures he got hanging up on the Wall of Fame?
You haven't seen this girl in, like, what? Forever?
Maybe you saw her with my friend and clean forgot about it.
You've been to his room, you've seen it.
There used to be a time when you looked at me like I was your favorite person in the world.
You had a look that you wanted to ask a question, just then?
I'm sorry we buried you, but you looked so dead.
You let me think I was going to die, and you watched me kill my best friend.
I fell in love... the moment you saw me For who I was...
You see your mom hurt, and you want to help.
- Yes, there was, and yes, you did.
Right, and so you saw for yourself, the people are against this.
- Yeah, yeah, yeah, I saw it!
"knowingly looking up at me, still inside you --
You looked me right in the eye and told me you'd give them a shot.
I wanted to say I was sorry, but you just looked at me as if you'd been expecting it.
Well, you was makin' like to lay hands on that woman.
You were with me... looking just as you are now.
You looked as if you were just as lonely as me. That is why I feel so close to you.
